<q:component name="LoginHandler">
  <q:action name="login" method="POST">
    <q:param name="username" type="string" required="true" />
    <q:param name="password" type="string" required="true" />
    
    <!-- Store user info in session -->
    <q:set name="session.userId" value="123" />
    <q:set name="session.username" value="{username}" />
    <q:set name="session.loggedIn" value="true" />
    <q:set name="session.loginTime" value="2025-11-05 10:30:00" />
    
    <q:redirect url="/dashboard" flash="Welcome back, {username}!" />
  </q:action>
  
  <form method="POST">
    <input type="text" name="username" />
    <input type="password" name="password" />
    <button type="submit">Login</button>
  </form>
</q:component>

expected_behavior: Stores user authentication data in session scope
